General.Name: Jiangsu Tongrun Equipment Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Tongrun Equipment Technology Co.,Ltd produces and sells metal tool cabinets in China. It offers precision sheet metal parts, photo-voltaic inverters, electrical control cabinets, high and low voltage circuit breakers, agricultural products, etc., as well as electrical products. The company also provides HV/LV complete-set switchgears and HV/LV electrics. It also exports its products to approximately 140 countries. The company was formerly known as Jiangsu Torin Office Furniture Co., Ltd. Jiangsu Tongrun Equipment Technology Co.,Ltd was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Changshu, China.
General.Address: Xin Longteng Industries district, Changshu, China, 215517
